CityGuestRooms

About

My first cooperative project, I've learned how to use and how important version control softwares are.

Used TortoiseSVN with my partner, everything went smooth. After that I went ahead and checked out Git, another VCS.

My tasks

  • - Messaging system — Back-end and some front-end of the messaging system
  • - User panel — Front-end of the panel where you could manage everything
  • - GoogleMaps API — Had to fix location searching using the API
